Ingredients.6: 1 (1 pound) loaf cocktail rye bread, or as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Cook beef and sausage in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.3: Meanwhile, microwave processed cheese food in a large microwave-safe bowl on high until melted, 3 to 4 minutes.

Directions.4: Stir Worcestershire sauce and ketchup into melted cheese, then stir in cooked meat until thoroughly combined.

Directions.5: Spoon about 2 tablespoons meat and cheese mixture onto each bread slice. Arrange bread in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven, in batches if necessary, until lightly browned and crisp, 10 to 15 minutes.
